title: Blind Chardonnay Tasting
description:
Join us on Wednesday, October 15, from 4–7 PM at Whispering Vine South Creek for a fun and interactive blind tasting event: “So You Think You Have a Favorite Chardonnay?” Put your palate to the test as we pour a lineup of our best-selling, crowd-favorite Chardonnays—without revealing the labels. Compare styles, discover new favorites, and see if your top pick still comes out on top.

Tasting Fee: $15 (Buy a bottle from the tasting and your fee is refunded)

Featured Wines:

• Ferrari-Carano Chardonnay 2023 – 91 pts James Suckling – Bright and creamy with lemon confit, vanilla pastry, and crisp apple on a lively, balanced finish.

• Mer Soleil Santa Lucia Highlands Reserve Chardonnay 2022 – Round and layered with citrus, honeysuckle, and brown spice over a creamy, refreshing finish.

• JaM Cellars Butter Chardonnay – Rich, bold, and luscious with ripe stone fruit, baked lemon, and a long, vanilla-oak finish.

• Harken Barrel Fermented Chardonnay 2023 – Toasted and buttery with crème brûlée, oak spice, and fresh pear balanced by bright acidity.

Taste blind, vote your favorite, and find out if your go-to Chardonnay still reigns supreme.
